name: epicene
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
belonging to all genders, or characteristic of all genders: "They" is often used as an epicene pronoun. Compare
gender-neutral
unisex
characteristic of no gender: She had an epicene assistant named Jave. Compare
agender
androgynous
old-fashioned used to describe a man whose appearance is thought to be similar to a woman's: She noted his epicene features - the long eyelashes, the full lips. Synonym
effeminate
